description:
Sequoia (http://sequoia.thinkboxsoftware.com/) is a product, currently in beta, from Thinkbox Software, for processing and meshing large point clouds. This talk dives into some technical details of what it takes to create a scalable point cloud system.

This talk will cover some of the details of how to create a scalable point cloud system, including how floating-point Morton order can be used to spatially organize a point cloud within a globally defined octree.
title: Sequoia: Point Cloud Processing and Meshing
